title: Nicole Kidman shares a sweet snap with Margot Robbie at The Ellen Show
text:
They star in the upcoming drama Bombshell together.

And on Monday, Nicole Kidman shared a sweet photo to Instagram of herself and Margot Robbie as they waited backstage at The Ellen DeGeneres Show.

The 52-year-old captioned the snap: 'Backstage with my Aussie girlfriend xx.'

'Backstage with my girlfriend': Nicole Kidman shared a sweet snap with Margot Robbie before appearing on The Ellen DeGeneres Show on Monday to promote their new film Bombshell

In the snap, the Australian actresses look glamorous as they cuddled up for a friendly photo.

Margot, 29, wore a leather-look maroon top, while Nicole rocked a stylish beige blazer.

'Queens,' one fan commented below the post.

White hot! It comes after Margot and Nicole attended a special screening of their new film Bombshell in Los Angeles on Sunday

The pair appeared on the Ellen DeGeneres Show alongside their Bombshell co-star Charlize Theron.

It comes after Margot and Nicole attended a special screening of their new film in Los Angeles on Sunday.

The two women wore matching white ensembles as they posed on the red carpet.

New film: Margot and Nicole star in the film, which is about the downfall of late Fox News chairman Roger Ailes, alongside Charlize Theron (centre)

Bombshell tells the story of late TV executive Roger Ailes and his downfall as chairman of Fox News following accusations of sexual harassment in 2016.

Nicole plays journalist Gretchen Carlson, while Charlize plays news anchor Megyn Kelly, who famously left Fox News in 2017 after the Ailes scandal and moved to NBC.

Unlike her two co-stars, Margot portrays a completely fictional character who goes by the name of Kayla Pospisil.
